alert.note: Alert for Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 7:18PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...Intense snow showers will impact portions of east central Idaho, southeastern Missoula, northern Granite, northern Ravalli and west central Powell Counties through 900 PM MDT/800 PM PDT/... At 817 PM MDT/717 PM PDT/, Doppler radar was tracking intense snow showers along a line extending from 11 miles southeast of Bonner-West Riverside to 30 miles southeast of Lowell. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Visibility one-quarter mile or less. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility could result in dangerous driving conditions. Roads may quickly become snow covered and slick. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Drummond, Stevensville, Darby, Victor, Conner, Woodside, Florence, Pinesdale, Grantsdale, Nimrod, Maxville, Jens, New Chicago, Bearmouth, Quigley, Corvallis, Clinton, Como and Bell Crossing. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between mile markers 115 and 162. Highway 93 S between mile markers 22 and 74. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
